Tester.name: Content languages and ontologies
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the JADE support for user defined content languages and ontologies included in the jade.content package

Tester.name: SL Operators
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the usage of the SL operators such as logical operators (AND, OR, NOT) and modal operators (B, I, U).

Tester.name: Inter Platform Communication
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to agent communication across different platforms.

Tester.name: Behaviours
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the behaviour scheduling, execution and block/restart mechanism

Tester.name: AMS
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the actions that can be requested to the AMS

Tester.name: DF
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the Yellow Pages service provided by the DF agent according to the FIPA specifications

Tester.name: Persistent_DF
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the persistence of Yellow Pages service provided by the DF agent.

Tester.name: JADE Management Ontology
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the actions included in the JADEManagementOntology such as CreateAgent and KillAgent

Tester.name: Mobility
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to agent mobility

Tester.name: Main-replication
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to fault-tolerance/main-replication

Tester.name: Persistent-delivery
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the Persistent Delivery service

Tester.name: ContractNet Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for the Contract Net interaction protocol

Tester.name: AchieveRE Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for "FIPA-request like" interaction protocols

Tester.name: Propose Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for "FIPA-propose" interaction protocols

Tester.name: Subscription Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for "FIPA-subscribe" interaction protocols

Tester.name: Two-Phase-Commit Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for the Two-phase-commit interaction protocols

Tester.name: jade.wrapper in-process interface
Tester.Description: This item includes tests for the APIs defined in the jade.wrapper package. The list of tests is still under construction.

Tester.name: Stress tests
Tester.Description: This item includes stress tests i.e. tests that do not focus on a specific case, but stress the system by performing a lot of operations.

Tester.name: Communication performance and scalability
Tester.Description: This item includes tests that measure the performances of the message transport mechanism for different types of communication (intra-container, inter-container, inter-platform...)

Tester.name: JADE running on wireless devices
Tester.Description: This item includes tests validating the execution of JADE containers and agents on MIDP devices. The execution of this group of tests requires the user to i) load the testleap.jar file on the MIDP device used for the tests and ii) manualy start JADE containers on it when requested.

Tester.name: UDP Monitoring
Tester.Description: This item includes tests for the UDP monitoring introduced in JADE 3.3

Tester.name: LEAP Split-container
Tester.Description: This item included tests on leap split-container.

Tester.name: Topic-based message delivery
Tester.Description: This item includes tests about the topic-based message delivery mechanism implemented by the TopicManagement service.

Tester.name: Stream content messages
Tester.Description: This item includes tests about the exchange of messages with stream content.
